Given:
$$f(x)=x^{2}$$ and
$$x = 2$$
?refs.1005-1: This is a speed test! You only got ten seconds for this one, so hurry up!
?refs.1005-2: Mark every <ins>animal</ins> in the text below.
?refs.1005-3: The quick brown fox does not jump, at all.
?refs.1005-4: Global warming is dangerous. Or is it? My cat seems to enjoy the warm weather.
?refs.1005-5: Just kidding, it certainly is not. Just think of the poor penguins.
?refs.4001-1: Select one of the radio buttons.
